lead_paragraph: The attorney general has been given sound recommendations for preventing and punishing rape in prison. It’s time he proceed with implementing them.
snippet: The attorney general has been given sound recommendations for preventing and punishing rape in prison. It’s time he proceed with implementing them.

headline.main: It’s Up to You, Mr. Holder
